transactionId.description:
Hexadecimal representation of the TransactionID defined
in Section 5.6.1

serverSigned1.description: The data object as required by ES10b.AuthenticateServer

serverSignature1.description: The signature as required by ES10b.AuthenticateServer

euiccCiPKIdToBeUsed.description: The CI Public Key to be used as required by ES10b.AuthenticateServer

serverCertificate.description:
The server Certificate as required by
ES10b.AuthenticateServer
